name: The Interstellar Explorer
description:
The Interstellar Explorer is a beautiful RPG style game that is centred around space exploration and science.  Play as Spyth and explore the planetary regions of the Solar System, to gain the title of Interstellar Explorer.

With its visual beauty and exciting content, The Interstellar Explorer can be easily consumed by all ages. It aims to provide an effective edutainment solution and can be used by teachers to introduce the ideas of space sciences among students.  

🎇Improves observational skills. 

🎇Provides better emotional and social development.

🎇Leaves lasting implications on the future of science.

🎇Develops imagination skills and creativity of the mind.
